articles.author: Lorraine Woellert
articles.title: Coronavirus kills 2 in Florida
articles.description: Presumptive positive cases added in Broward County.
articles.content:
Two people in Florida have died from the coronavirus and two more have been added to the presumptive positive list, the state Department of Health said late Friday.
A person in Santa Rosa County and a person in Lee County died. Both had been on international… [+590 chars]

articles.author: By Samuel Brannen and Kathleen Hicks
articles.title: We Predicted a Coronavirus Pandemic. Here’s What Policymakers Could Have Seen Coming.
articles.description: Last year we ran a disaster scenario shockingly similar to the news now. Here’s what experts realized the world is getting wrong, and how they can fix it.
articles.content: What we found, overall, was that the world has changed in ways that make it far harder to contain diseaseand some of the mistakes that fuel its spread have already happened in the current real-world outbreak. There is still time, though, to think more careful… [+11475 chars]
